Uses of Class
org.fax4j.spi.http.HTTPRequest

Packages that use HTTPRequest
org.fax4j.bridge.http Provides the API classes for a HTTP based web2fax bridge. 
org.fax4j.spi.http Provides the HTTP based fax client SPI implementation.
